snippet.title: Arma 3 Contact - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
What if humanity suddenly encounters extraterrestrial intelligence on Earth? https://www.arma3.com/contact 

Watch the Announcement Trailer for #Arma3Contact – a spin-off expansion about the most important discovery in the history of mankind. Scheduled for release on July 25, Arma 3 Contact features a military science fiction singleplayer campaign, which will arrive together with a new terrain, factions, weapons, vehicles, and gear for the wider #Arma3 sandbox.

Pre-order Arma 3 Contact now for a 10% discount and Sneak Preview Access to Livonia:
Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/1021790
Bohemia Store - https://store.bistudio.com/products/arma3-contact

About Arma 3
Experience true combat gameplay in a massive military sandbox. Authentic, diverse, open – Arma 3 sends you to war.

Facebook - http://www.facebook.com/ArmaPlatform
Twitter - http://twitter.com/ArmaPlatform
YouTube - http://youtube.com/ArmaPlatform
Steam - http://steamcommunity.com/app/107410
